title: Throwing axe
data:
| [Template:Iron color](/index.php?title=Template:Iron_color\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Template:Iron color (page does not exist)") [File:Throwing axe.png](/index.php?title=Special:Upload\&wpDestFile=Throwing_axe.png "File:Throwing axe.png") |                                                         |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | throwing axe                                            |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | throwing axe                                            |
| Damage vs. small                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 1d5                                                     |
| Damage vs. large                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 1d3                                                     |
| To-hit bonus                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | +0                                                      |

| Size                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")             |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 10 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | [60](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                             |
| Material                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron")                               |

A **throwing axe** is a type of [ranged weapon](/wiki/Ranged_weapon "Ranged weapon") that appears in *[SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack")*. It is made of [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron"), and can be stacked and [multishot](/wiki/Multishot "Multishot").

Throwing axes are a new weapon that uses **axe skill**.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Description](#Description)
- [2 History](#History)
- [3 Variants](#Variants)
  - [3.1 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

## Description

Like other [axes](/wiki/Axe "Axe"), throwing axes do bonus damage vs wood golems.

## History

The throwing axe first appears in [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack").

## Variants

### Hack'EM

| [Template:Iron color](/index.php?title=Template:Iron_color\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Template:Iron color (page does not exist)") [File:Throwing axe.png](/index.php?title=Special:Upload\&wpDestFile=Throwing_axe.png "File:Throwing axe.png") |                                                         |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | throwing axe                                            |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | throwing axe                                            |
| Damage vs. small                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 1d5                                                     |
| Damage vs. large                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 1d4                                                     |
| To-hit bonus                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | +2                                                      |
| Weapon skill                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | [axe](/wiki/Axe "Axe")                                  |
| Size                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")             |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 10 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | [20](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                             |
| Material                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron")                               |

In Hack'EM, the damage, weight, and to-hit was slightly adjusted to make it more appealing as a ranged weapon.

You can #craft new throwing axes by forging axes and daggers together.

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.6. Click here for more information.](/images/5/57/Nh366-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.6. Click here for more information.")

Throwing axe

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Template:Iron color File:Throwing axe.png
Name throwing axe
Appearance throwing axe
Damage vs. small 1d5
Damage vs. large 1d3
To-hit bonus +0
Weapon skill axe
Size one-handed
Base price 10 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 60
Material iron

A throwing axe is a type of ranged weapon that appears in SpliceHack. It is made of iron, and can be stacked and multishot.

Throwing axes are a new weapon that uses axe skill.

Contents

  • 1 Description
  • 2 History
  • 3 Variants
    • 3.1 Hack'EM

Description

Like other axes, throwing axes do bonus damage vs wood golems.

History

The throwing axe first appears in SpliceHack.

Variants

Hack'EM

Template:Iron color File:Throwing axe.png
Name throwing axe
Appearance throwing axe
Damage vs. small 1d5
Damage vs. large 1d4
To-hit bonus +2
Weapon skill axe
Size one-handed
Base price 10 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 20
Material iron

In Hack'EM, the damage, weight, and to-hit was slightly adjusted to make it more appealing as a ranged weapon.

You can #craft new throwing axes by forging axes and daggers together.

A '''throwing axe''' is a type of [[ranged weapon]] that appears in ''[[SpliceHack]]''. It is made of [[iron]], and can be stacked and [[multishot]].

Throwing axes are a new weapon that uses '''axe skill'''.

==Description==

Like other [[axe]]s, throwing axes do bonus damage vs wood golems.

==History==
The throwing axe first appears in [[SpliceHack]].

==Variants==
=== Hack'EM ===
{{weapon
  |color=iron color
  |tile=[[image:throwing axe.png]]
  |name=throwing axe
  |smalldmg=1d5
  |largedmg=1d4
  |tohit=<nowiki>+2</nowiki>
  |skill=axe
  |cost=10
  |weight=20
  |material=iron
}}

In Hack'EM, the damage, weight, and to-hit was slightly adjusted to make it more appealing as a ranged weapon.

You can #craft new throwing axes by forging axes and daggers together.
